channel.title: Component test utils Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Component test utils news and events.

item.title: Announcing Beta of component-test-utils
item.description:
I've been working on this side-project for almost 1 year now and I think it's mature enough to go onto the next step: the official Beta!

I've never communicated about this library except to my closest co-workers and friends. So let's starts this year...

item.title: Starting the project !
item.description:
Hello world,

The project officially start now !

Hope you will enjoy doing testing your components.
